segments.text: Can I see him please , Mrs Williams ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You look very well , Jimmy . You are better now , but you mustn't get up yet.You must stay in bed for another two days.The boy mustn't go to school yet , Mrs Williams . And he mustn't eat rich food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does he have a temperature , doctor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . He must remain in bed for another two days . He can get up for about two hours each day , but you must keep the room warm . Where's Mr Williams this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's in bed , doctor . Can you see him , please ? He has a bad cold , too !
segments.speaker: S2
